title: Using Wind Direction to Predict Weather
brief: How to determine wind direction and use it to predict incoming weather changes.
steps: Step 1: Drop a few leaves, grass, or small debris to observe wind direction.
Step 2: Alternatively, watch treetops to see which direction they're bending.
Step 3: Note if winds are shifting rapidly, which indicates unsettled atmosphere.
Step 4: Use established wind direction to predict the type of weather approaching your area.
warnings: Rapidly shifting winds often indicate severe weather approaching.
Sudden wind changes can bring dangerous storms quickly.
